p: Alkaloids are widely distributed in the plant kingdom, with some estimates that 25% of Gymnosperms and Angiosperms produce these metabolites. Moreover, alkaloids are present in plants from the families, Apocynaceae [ 6], Asteraceae [ 7], Papaveraceae [ 8], Rutaceae [ 9], Solanaceae [ 10], Erythroxylaceae [ 11], ans Fabaceae [ 12] among others.
